Struct template mutable_

boost::heap::mutable_ — Configure heap as mutable.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/heap/policies.hpp>

template<bool T> 
struct mutable_ {
};

Description

Certain heaps need to be configured specifically do be mutable.
